testimonialsBanner.titlePart1: What our clients say about their

items.text: AFB expresses their satisfaction with our services with a rating of 16/20. It is an honor to exceed their expectations and contribute positively to their experience.
items.author: General Manager

items.text: Individual customers' satisfaction is palpable regarding the wireless home automation and smart building project. This demonstrates the success and positive impact.
items.author: Individual Customers

items.text: AFB BEKOKO is fully satisfied with the installation of two power sources and an inverter, as well as smoke and flood detectors. Quality service!
items.author: AFB BEKOKO

items.text: SGC expresses its satisfaction with the improvement of lighting and air conditioning in their buildings. The intervention fully met their expectations.
items.author: General Manager

items.text: Elecit delivered an exceptional home automation installation to KILO FORCE. We are delighted with the quality of service and the modernization provided. Thank you for this experience!
items.author: General Manager

items.text: The maintenance and repair of our air conditioning systems by ElecIT brings us complete satisfaction. Their professionalism and efficiency have significantly improved our experience. We highly recommend ElecIT for their exceptional services.
items.author: SAAR ASSURANCE

hero.title: What you need to know about
hero.subtitle: AFRICA 1ST HIGH TECH COMPANY
hero.description: Because beyond the Cameroonian market, we want to develop all of Africa through our services.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Through continuous technology monitoring and a culture of creativity, we develop innovative approaches to meet our partners' needs.

items.title: Transformation
items.description: We support our clients in their transition towards more efficient and sustainable models through the integration of new technologies and process optimization.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: Through high quality standards, sharp expertise and attention to detail, we guarantee results that meet the most demanding expectations.

entrepriseTeam.title: The team
entrepriseTeam.subtitle: These actors who unite to meet your needs
entrepriseTeam.description: We mobilize the right skills at the right time. This human and technical wealth allows us to respond with agility and precision to the most varied challenges of our clients, from consulting to implementation.

entrepriseAcc.title: Frequently asked questions
entrepriseAcc.contactSubtitle: We will be happy to answer your questions.

items.question: Where are you located and in which regions do you operate?
items.answer: Our headquarters are based in Douala and Yaoundé; but we operate throughout the national territory and in certain areas of West Africa. For specific projects, we also study international interventions.

items.question: What are your average project timelines?
items.answer: Timelines vary depending on project complexity. Generally, we deliver standard projects in 2-4 weeks.

items.question: How to get a personalized quote?
items.answer: You can contact us via the online form or by phone. We will send you a quote within 48 hours.

items.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complete after-sales service including maintenance and 24/7 technical support.

popup.title: Contact Us
popup.subtitle: We will respond as soon as possible
popup.availability: We are available on WhatsApp Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 6 PM. Feel free to contact us.

hero.title: Inside ElecIT
hero.subtitle: Innovation, Expertise & Company Life
hero.description1: An open window into our expertise and culture.
hero.description2: Explore our projects, innovations and vision of modern engineering.
hero.description3: Dive into ElecIT's daily life, where technology meets people.

featured.title: The building that adapts to you
featured.excerpt: Every project starts with an idea, but it's the design that transforms that idea into a real solution.

posts.title: The building that adapts to you
posts.excerpt: Every project starts with an idea, but it's the design that transforms that...

content.heading1: Smart design from the ground up
content.paragraph1: Every project starts with an idea, but it's the design that transforms that idea into a real solution. Thanks to Computer-Aided Design (CAD), we model parts and structures with millimeter precision.
content.paragraph2: We thus gain in efficiency, cost and overall quality.
content.paragraph3: Metal, an ancient material, is one of the major pillars of human evolution. From the first artisanal tools to modern industrial structures, it accompanies every stage of progress.
content.paragraph4: At ElecIT ENGINEERING, we make metal more than just a raw material: we make it a sustainable engineering solution, designed to last.

items.title: Content Management System (CMS) Software
items.excerpt: We designed and developed a custom content management system (CMS)…
items.description: We designed and developed a custom content management system (CMS), designed to offer simple, fast and fully customizable administration.
items.utility: This solution allows the company to effectively manage its information, services and updates without depending on external technical support
items.clientFeedback: The CMS designed by ElecIT Engineering simplified our content management. The tool is intuitive, fast and perfectly adapted to our needs. A real time-saver on a daily basis.
